There were no other sightings in Corydon on or around October 2nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details daughter & i coming home from quick trip for milk.i see something to my left,in the sky ,& say to her 'what is that up there to your left'?she looks out her window & at first doesn't know , thinks it might be a plane.no sooner than she replied , it slowly drifted right in front of the car approx. 100-125 ft. in the air.it was definately a triangle shape w\rounded corners as the ones seen earlier in the year.but it didn't have the circular lights ,lit up anyway, it just had a solid blue on the left tip, red on the right & strobing bright white light in front.it made no noise that we could tell, & did not affect the car operations.so i chased after it , since it was now going down the road we needed to turn on(shiloh rd. corydon)so i sped up to it,& as i get caught up w\it it veers off the road to the right , like it's circling round to go back the way it came from...only as it veered it tilted completely on it's side & remained that way as it flew straight(no longer turning)it just stayed on it's side!blue light at top & red light now exactly under blue one!!totally cool...my daughter was so happy to finally see one w\all of the activity we've had around here, this was her first close up sighting. they like corydon for some reason...maybe because we kindof like seeing them.;) (it was as big as a commercial airplane)
